q1: Has Croatia ever hosted the World Cup?
a1: Croatia has never hosted the World Cup.
q2: Was Croatia in the World Cup last year?
a2: they were and they reached for the first time the world cup's final.
q3: Do you think they should of gone further with their squad>
a3: Do you think Croatia didn't win this year because of their current coach?
q4: No,even though they have great players, they also had easier rivals in playoffs until they finally came across a very strong France team.
q5: I think it was not because of the coach, despite everything, they played very well
a5: if they all played well, it must be a tribute
